# Getting Started

## 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap, tidyverse, funModeling)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
NGA_wp <- read_rds("data/rds/NGA_wp.rds")
```
:::


# Basic Choropleth Mapping

### Visualising distribution of non-functional water point


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p1 <- tm_shape(NGA_wp) +
  tm_fill("wp_functional",
          n=10,
          style="equal",
          palette="Blues") +
  tm_borders(lwd = 0.1,
             alpha = 1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of functional water point by LGAs",
            legend.outside = FALSE)
```
:::


Choropleth of total water points

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p2 <- tm_shape(NGA_wp) +
  tm_fill("total_wp",
          n=10,
          style="equal",
          palette="Blues") +
  tm_borders(lwd = 0.1,
             alpha = 1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Distribution of functional water point by LGAs",
            legend.outside = FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_arrange(p2,p1,nrow=1)
```

## Choropleth Map for Rates


#### Deriving Proportion of Functional Water Points and Non-Functional Water Points


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
NGA_wp <- NGA_wp %>%
  mutate(pct_functional = wp_functional/total_wp) %>%
  mutate(pct_nonfunctional = wp_nonfunctional/total_wp)
```
:::


#### Plotting map of rate
Plot a choropleth map showing the distribution of percentage functional water point by LGA


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(NGA_wp) +
  tm_fill("pct_functional",
          n=10,
          style = "equal",
          palette = "Blues",
          legend.hist = TRUE) +
  tm_borders(lwd = 0.1,
             alpha = 1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Rate map of functional water point by LGAs",
            legend.outside = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
